properties.name: website.automate.runner.job-poll-delay
properties.description: Defines pause between job poll attempts.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.id
properties.description: Unique ID of the runner instance.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.clean-up-delay
properties.description: Defines pause between cleanups of stale containers.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.concurrent
properties.description: Number of maximum allowed parallel scenario executions.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.docker.uri
properties.description: URI or path to the Docker daemon.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.docker.image
properties.description: Image to use for scenario execution.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.docker.container-label
properties.description: Label automatically added to all child containers.

properties.name: website.automate.runner.docker.max-execution-time
properties.description: Timeout after which the container considered to be stale.
